metadata.description: Name of the business intelligence dashboard
Resource ID of the Application Insights instance

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// User Activity Overview
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d)
| where name in ('FileUpload', 'ChatInteraction', 'FileAccess')
| extend userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId)
| where isnotempty(userId) and userId != 'anonymous'
| summarize 
    TotalUsers = dcount(userId),
    DailyActiveUsers = dcountif(userId, timestamp > ago(1d)),
    WeeklyActiveUsers = dcountif(userId, timestamp > ago(7d)),
    TotalSessions = dcount(strcat(userId, '_', tostring(customDimensions.sessionId))),
    TotalInteractions = count()
| project 
    TotalUsers,
    DAU = DailyActiveUsers,
    WAU = WeeklyActiveUsers,
    Sessions = TotalSessions,
    Interactions = TotalInteractions

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// CSV Processing Business Metrics
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d) and name == 'CSVFileUpload'
| extend 
    fileSize = todouble(customMeasurements.fileSize),
    rowCount = todouble(customMeasurements.rowCount),
    userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId)
| summarize 
    FilesProcessed = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(userId),
    TotalDataProcessedMB = round(sum(fileSize) / 1024 / 1024, 2),
    TotalRowsProcessed = sum(rowCount),
    AvgFileSize = round(avg(fileSize) / 1024 / 1024, 2),
    AvgRowsPerFile = round(avg(rowCount), 0)
| project 
    FilesProcessed,
    UniqueUsers,
    TotalDataMB = TotalDataProcessedMB,
    TotalRows = TotalRowsProcessed,
    AvgFileSizeMB = AvgFileSize,
    AvgRowsPerFile

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Chat Interaction Analytics
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d) and name == 'CSVChatInteraction'
| extend 
    userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId),
    messageLength = todouble(customMeasurements.messageLength),
    responseTime = todouble(customMeasurements.responseTime),
    success = tostring(customDimensions.success) == 'true'
| summarize 
    TotalChats = count(),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(userId),
    SuccessfulChats = countif(success),
    AvgMessageLength = round(avg(messageLength), 0),
    AvgResponseTime = round(avg(responseTime), 0),
    P95ResponseTime = round(percentile(responseTime, 95), 0)
| extend SuccessRate = round((todouble(SuccessfulChats) / todouble(TotalChats)) * 100, 2)
| project 
    TotalChats,
    UniqueUsers,
    SuccessfulChats,
    SuccessRate,
    AvgMsgLength = AvgMessageLength,
    AvgResponseMs = AvgResponseTime,
    P95ResponseMs = P95ResponseTime

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Daily User Engagement Trends
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(30d)
| where name in ('FileUpload', 'ChatInteraction', 'FileAccess')
| extend userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId)
| where isnotempty(userId) and userId != 'anonymous'
| summarize 
    ActiveUsers = dcount(userId),
    FileUploads = countif(name == 'FileUpload'),
    ChatInteractions = countif(name == 'ChatInteraction'),
    FileAccesses = countif(name == 'FileAccess')
    by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp asc
| render timechart with (title='Daily User Engagement Trends', xtitle='Date', ytitle='Count')

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// User Behavior Patterns
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d)
| where name in ('FileUpload', 'ChatInteraction', 'FileAccess')
| extend userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId)
| where isnotempty(userId) and userId != 'anonymous'
| summarize 
    FileUploads = countif(name == 'FileUpload'),
    ChatInteractions = countif(name == 'ChatInteraction'),
    FileAccesses = countif(name == 'FileAccess'),
    FirstActivity = min(timestamp),
    LastActivity = max(timestamp),
    SessionCount = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.sessionId))
    by userId
| extend 
    TotalActivities = FileUploads + ChatInteractions + FileAccesses,
    ActivitySpan = LastActivity - FirstActivity,
    UserType = case(
        FileUploads > 0 and ChatInteractions > 0, 'Active User',
        FileUploads > 0 and ChatInteractions == 0, 'Upload Only',
        FileUploads == 0 and ChatInteractions > 0, 'Chat Only',
        'View Only'
    )
| summarize 
    UserCount = count(),
    AvgFileUploads = round(avg(FileUploads), 1),
    AvgChatInteractions = round(avg(ChatInteractions), 1),
    AvgSessions = round(avg(SessionCount), 1)
    by UserType
| order by UserCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Top Users by Activity
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d)
| where name in ('FileUpload', 'ChatInteraction', 'FileAccess')
| extend 
    userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId),
    userEmail = tostring(customDimensions.userEmail)
| where isnotempty(userId) and userId != 'anonymous'
| summarize 
    FileUploads = countif(name == 'FileUpload'),
    ChatInteractions = countif(name == 'ChatInteraction'),
    FileAccesses = countif(name == 'FileAccess'),
    LastActivity = max(timestamp),
    SessionCount = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.sessionId))
    by userId, userEmail
| extend TotalActivities = FileUploads + ChatInteractions + FileAccesses
| order by TotalActivities desc
| take 20
| project 
    UserId = userId,
    Email = userEmail,
    TotalActivities,
    FileUploads,
    ChatInteractions,
    FileAccesses,
    Sessions = SessionCount,
    LastSeen = LastActivity

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// File Processing Efficiency
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d) and name == 'CSVFileUpload'
| extend 
    fileSize = todouble(customMeasurements.fileSize),
    rowCount = todouble(customMeasurements.rowCount),
    duration = todouble(customMeasurements.duration),
    sizeCategory = tostring(customDimensions.sizeCategory),
    success = tostring(customDimensions.success) == 'true'
| summarize 
    FilesProcessed = count(),
    SuccessfulFiles = countif(success),
    AvgProcessingTime = avg(duration),
    ProcessingRate = sum(rowCount) / sum(duration) * 1000, // rows per second
    TotalDataProcessed = sum(fileSize)
    by sizeCategory
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round((todouble(SuccessfulFiles) / todouble(FilesProcessed)) * 100, 2),
    AvgProcessingTimeMs = round(AvgProcessingTime, 0),
    ProcessingRateRowsPerSec = round(ProcessingRate, 0),
    TotalDataMB = round(TotalDataProcessed / 1024 / 1024, 2)
| order by case(sizeCategory == 'small', 1, sizeCategory == 'medium', 2, sizeCategory == 'large', 3, 4)
| project 
    SizeCategory = sizeCategory,
    Files = FilesProcessed,
    SuccessRate,
    AvgTimeMs = AvgProcessingTimeMs,
    RowsPerSec = ProcessingRateRowsPerSec,
    DataMB = TotalDataMB

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
// Chat Engagement Quality
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(7d) and name == 'CSVChatInteraction'
| extend 
    userId = tostring(customDimensions.userId),
    messageLength = todouble(customMeasurements.messageLength),
    responseTime = todouble(customMeasurements.responseTime),
    complexityCategory = tostring(customDimensions.complexityCategory),
    success = tostring(customDimensions.success) == 'true'
| summarize 
    ChatCount = count(),
    SuccessfulChats = countif(success),
    AvgMessageLength = avg(messageLength),
    AvgResponseTime = avg(responseTime),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(userId)
    by complexityCategory
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round((todouble(SuccessfulChats) / todouble(ChatCount)) * 100, 2),
    AvgMsgLength = round(AvgMessageLength, 0),
    AvgResponseMs = round(AvgResponseTime, 0)
| order by case(complexityCategory == 'simple', 1, complexityCategory == 'medium', 2, complexityCategory == 'complex', 3, 4)
| project 
    Complexity = complexityCategory,
    Chats = ChatCount,
    Users = UniqueUsers,
    SuccessRate,
    AvgMsgLength,
    AvgResponseMs

inputs.name: Query
Query
